headline: Concerned About a Recession? These Dividend Stocks Deliver Durable Growth During Downturns.
summary: One of the first cuts many economically cyclical companies make is to their dividends.  Through its various local utilities, Consolidated Edison provides electricity and natural gas services to the New York City region and surrounding areas.
